mapper.select: SELECT C.COMP_CD, C.MEM_CD, C.CODE_CD, CO.CODE_NAME AS codeTypeName, C.CODE_CD_ACTION, CA.CODE_NAME AS actionTypeName, C.COMP_TITLE, C.COMP_CONTENTS, C.COMP_SECRET, C.COMP_DELETE, C.COMP_RDATE FROM COMPLAINTS C INNER JOIN CODE CO ON C.CODE_CD = CO.CODE_CD INNER JOIN CODE CA ON C.CODE_CD_ACTION = CA.CODE_CD
